name: Nice
fun_fact: Fun fact: Nice has its own protected culinary heritage! The 'Cuisine Nissarde' quality mark recognizes only 30 restaurants (as of 2023) that use authentic, traditional Nice recipes - a badge of honor from the Nice Tourist Office!
